channel.title: math.HO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.HO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Linear Algebra In A Jiffy
item.description: arXiv:2403.13957v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: By marking initial and terminal non-zero entries of elements of a non-trivial subspace of $\mathbb{F}^{n}$, we define right/left dimensions and associated canonical bases for general subspaces of $\mathbb{F}^{n}$. This provides a beeline to the fundamental results on general bases and dimension (including dimensions of complements, rank of a transpose, Rank-Nullity Theorem, Full Rank factorization, and existence/uniqueness of RREF), bypassing some of the traditional stumbling blocks and time sinks.
item.dc:creator: Leo Livshits
